definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: A crowd of more than 84, 000 people attended the World Cup final at Soccer City Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 000多人观看了在足球城体育场举行的世界杯决赛。

sentences.english: Tabb is the first woman to referee a world snooker championship final.
sentences.chinese: 塔普是第一位在斯诺克世锦赛决赛中担当裁判的女性。

sentences.english: In the men's team final, Hungary team to play extremely well.
sentences.chinese: 在男子团体决赛中，匈牙利队的发挥非常出色。

sentences.english: The Rockets were a popular choice to make the Western Conference finals when the season began.
sentences.chinese: 赛季初的时候，火箭是众望所归的西部决赛球队。

sentences.english: All competition details of the preliminary and final will be informed by post.
sentences.chinese: 有关初赛及决赛之资料及结果将以邮寄方式通知。

sentences.english: The women’s singles final and men’s singles final are both Sept. 12.
sentences.chinese: 男单和女单决赛都将于9月12日进行。

sentences.english: Top 8 of the preliminary will fight for the bonus on Apr.14 and 15 in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 初赛八强将于4月14日和15日在首尔进行决赛。

sentences.english: Rafael Nadal rejoices after defeating Robin Soderling in the men's final June 6.
sentences.chinese: 纳达尔击败而高兴在男子决赛6月6日索德林。

sentences.english: We’ll need to be in the final if we want the trophy.
sentences.chinese: 要拿大耳朵奖杯的话，我们必须杀进决赛。

sentences.english: And then went up against the Mavericks.
sentences.chinese: 接着他们又杀进决赛，勇斗小牛队。

sentences.english: Octopus oracle Paul is predicting Germany will be defeated by Spain at the World Cup semifinal.
sentences.chinese: 八爪鱼保罗推测德国在半决赛中将被西班牙战胜。

sentences.english: Bulls win, 88-83, they go to the finals again.
sentences.chinese: 公牛队胜出，88比83，他们再次进入总决赛。

sentences.english: They got knocked out in the semi's, battered actually, end of.
sentences.chinese: 他们在半决赛中被淘汰了，而且被碾得粉碎。

sentences.english: Why not have the Ivory Coast as the first African team in the Final?
sentences.chinese: 科特迪瓦为什么不能是第一个闯进决赛圈的球队呢？

sentences.english: He swept his match winning 3 sets in a row in the finals.
sentences.chinese: 在决赛中他以三连胜大败对手。

sentences.english: The event led to a three-way play-off but it wasn't an impressive finish.
sentences.chinese: 这场赛事最后是三方决赛，但结局并不吸引人。

definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
(sports) semifinal or quarterfinal/to compete in a semifinal (or a quarterfinal)
